data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sekerka, Lukas, Borowiec, Lech (2015): Subgenera of Charidotella Weise with description of a new subgenus and species from Brazil (Coleoptera, Chrysomelidae, Cassidinae, Cassidini). ZooKeys 506: 61-74, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.506.8770, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.506.8770
